/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, viewed from a high vantage point. The street, divided by a median, is filled with cars and motorcycles, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades made of brick and glass, reflecting the sunlight. A pedestrian bridge arches over the street, providing a safe passage for pedestrians amidst the vehicular traffic. The sky above is a hazy blue, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon setting. The overall scene paints a picture of urban life, with its blend of architecture, transportation, and nature.
